Al-Warad () is a village in southern Syria, administratively part of the Izraa District in the Daraa Governorate. According to the Syria Central Bureau of Statistics (CBS), Al-Warad had a population of 250 in the 2004 census. Its inhabitants are predominantly Sunni Muslims.
Religious buildings
* Ali ibn Abi Talib Mosque
